description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a Tic Tac Toe web application's frontend, including styles for light and dark themes, as well as responsive design and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for text alignment, background color, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation behavior.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including background color, display properties, and transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color and hover effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, background color, borders, padding, and transitions.
